name: Glowing Cat
storyline:
Glowing cat is a mini game which lets you capture and collect variety of animals and insects. multiple mini games are available inside the game to recharge the battery and keeping the non stop game momentum up and running. 
Team choice and event participation to contribute in team victories. 
Multiple glowing animals to choose from and a list of different species are available to be captured and collected in the gallery. 
Screenshots of favorite species can be taken and shared among family and friends. 
All the captured insects and glowing animals are stored in an easily accessible album. Animals need to be kept glowing and bright in order for insects to appear. bright strong light attracts more insects. 
Another great feature of this game is it's charging method. when the battery runs out, there are various mini game options available to recharge the battery. titles and awards can also be collected and redeemed for certain items and coins. some of the titles hold significant value and benefits. 
FEATURES: 
	▪	Capture multifarious insects and complete the album. 
	▪	Choose from a list of various glowing animals. 
	▪	Set of mini-games to charge the battery. 
	▪	Power-play option lets you capture more insects. 
	▪	Participate in the events and contribute to your team victories. 
	▪	Take screenshots with your favorite species and share them.
summary:
A mini game where with the help of glowing animals you can capture and collect variety of species. light attracts the insects and bugs to gather around and can be captured and saved in the album. 
Multiple mini games inside the game for recharging the battery keep the gaming experience non stop and running. 
Team choice and event participation to contribute in team victories. 
Also with many more features, screenshots with favorite species can be taken and shared among family and friends.
